fleets.name: Marauders
fleets.ability: Take 1 Production for each Rival Ship destroyed by this fleet.

fleets.name: Battle Group
fleets.ability: This fleet may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 in Space Battles.

fleets.name: Assault
fleets.ability: This fleet may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 in Planetary Invasions.

advancements.name: Disruptor Technology
advancements.ability: Your Rolls To Hit of 6 always Score a Hit, regardless of the Rival's Shield Modifier.

advancements.name: Mass Fire Tactics
advancements.ability: In Space Battles, failed To Hit Rolls of doubles destroy 1 enemy Ship.

advancements.name: Adapted Cloaking Device
advancements.ability: Your Ships have First Strike in Space Battles during your turn.

fleets.name: System Patrol
fleets.ability: Each Ship in the Fleet rolls two dice when Rolling To Hit in a Space Battle in Breen Territory.

fleets.name: Science Fleet
fleets.ability: When this Fleet Braves a Hazard, only roll for one of its ships. This Fleet may Brave the Hazard of a Phenomenon they Occupy without Exhausting a Command.

fleets.name: Deep Strike Fleet
fleets.ability: This Fleet may Invade a Planet from and Adjacent Sector. If it does so, it cannot take Control of the System, and must Retreat after the first Combat Round.

advancements.name: Breen Cloaking Device
advancements.ability: Your Ships have First Strike in Space Battles during your turn.

advancements.name: Energy Damping Weapons
advancements.ability: Your Rolls To Hit of 5 or 6 always Score a Hit, regardless of the Rival's Shield Modifier.

specialAbilities.name: Territorial
specialAbilities.ability: Battle is in Breen Territory (Breen ships reroll all failed hits)

fleets.name: Commerce Enforcement Squadron
fleets.ability: This Fleet may end its movement in a System containing rival Ships, regardless of Trade status. It may not move past Hostile rival ships. This Fleet may Enter Warp on your turn without Exhausting a Command.

fleets.name: Market Penetration Convoy
fleets.ability: This Fleet may connect new Space Lanes to Systems beyond the maximum number of Space Lanes the System allows.

fleets.name: Franchise Establishment Flotilla
fleets.ability: While moving, you may remove Ships from this Fleet and place them in any Systems the Fleet moves through. If this Fleet drops below 3 Ships while moving, it disbands after moving.

fleets.name: Science Fleet
fleets.ability: When this Fleet Braves a Hazard, only roll for one of its ships. This Fleet may Brave the Hazard of a Phenomenon they Occupy without Exhausting a Command.

fleets.name: Mining Fleet
fleets.ability: When this Fleet Occupies an Undeveloped System or phenomenon you may use one Command to take 2 production. This may only be used once per turn.

fleets.name: Battle Group
fleets.ability: This fleet may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 in Space Battles.

advancements.name: Romulan Cloaking Device
advancements.ability: Your Ships have First Strike in Space Battles during your turn.

advancements.name: Superior Shield Harmonics
advancements.ability: Your Fleets may ignore the first Casualty in each round of space battles.

advancements.name: Superior Targeting Array
advancements.ability: Your ships and nodes may reroll 1 To Hit roll in each round of combat.

advancements.name: Romulan Disrupters
advancements.ability: Your Rolls To Hit of 6 always Score a Hit, regardless of the Rival's Shield Modifier.

fleets.name: Hunter Killer
fleets.ability: In the first round of Space Battles, all this Fleet's To Hit rolls automatically score hits.

fleets.name: Overseer
fleets.ability: If this Fleet occupies a Cardassian controlled system during resource generation, double the production generated by that system. May not be used in orbit of Cardassia Prime.

fleets.name: Assault Fleet
fleets.ability: This Fleet may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 in Planetary Invasions.

advancements.name: Weaponized Starbases
advancements.ability: Your Starbases now add 3 additional dice To Hit.

fleets.name: Battle Group
fleets.ability: This fleet may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1 in Space Battles.

fleets.name: Science Fleet
fleets.ability: When this Fleet Braves a Hazard, only roll for one of its ships. This Fleet may Brave the Hazard of a Phenomenon they Occupy without Exhausting a Command.

fleets.name: Colonization Fleet
fleets.ability: On your turn, you may discard a Ship from this Fleet and Disband this Fleet to immediately colonize an undeveloped system without spending a Culture

fleets.name: Diplomatic Fleet
fleets.ability: You may re-roll your Hegemony Roll in Systems this Fleet occupies.

advancements.name: Tachyon Detection Array
advancements.ability: Romulan Cloaking Technologies effects may not be used in Sectors containing your Ships or in space battles against your ships.

fleets.name: Domination Fleet
fleets.ability: If this Fleet has 6 or fewer Ships in your Recharge Stage, you may spend 1 Command Token to Build 1 Ship in it.

fleets.name: Battleship Fleet
fleets.ability: Exhaust an extra Command Token to Move this Fleet. Increase the Shield modifier of this fleet by 1. Fleet has a tactical maneuver or retreat move of 1 sector after space battle or planetary invasion.

fleets.name: Strike Fleet
fleets.ability: Before either player rolls to hit in the first combat round of a space battle you may spend a command token to have all this fleet's hit rolls automatically score a hit.

advancements.name: Phased Polaron Beams
advancements.ability: Your Rolls To Hit of 6 always Score a Hit, regardless of the Rival's Shield Modifier.

fleets.name: Consul Halitra
fleets.ability: When in Orbit of an independent civilization or rival system whose trade agreement you hold, this fleet may place or remove a Vulcan ambassador. This does not use a command and may not be done while moving.

fleets.name: Science Halitra
fleets.ability: This Fleet may re-roll any failed hazardous system tests or brave the hazard of a phenomenon it occupies without exhausting a command.

fleets.name: Observation Halitra
fleets.ability: When entering a new system at impulse speed this fleet may discard the first drawn exploration card and draw a new one. When this fleet retreats from a space battle it may enter warp instead of its normal impulse speed retreat move.

advancements.name: Stone of Gol
advancements.ability: In Space Battles, you may reroll any dice equal to or higher than your current Ascendancy.

fleets.name: Reconnaissance Fleet
fleets.ability: When this Fleet occupies or is in a Space Lane adjacent to a Rival-controlled System, you may Exhaust a Command to place an Andorian Token on the System. You may not place more Andorian Tokens than you have Ascendancy. You may remove Tokens at any time.

fleets.name: Strike Fleet
fleets.ability: Ships in this Fleet receive +1 to Hit Rolls against Ships or Nodes in Systems marked with an Andorian Token.

fleets.name: Command Fleet
fleets.ability: You may Exhaust a Command to switch the position of this fleet with any other Andorian fleet.

advancements.name: A.I. Tactical Analysis
advancements.ability: In Space Battles, your opponent must reroll one hit each round.
